sourcesContent:
import { Formik, Form, Field } from 'formik' import './customer-profile.css' import companyImage from './Generic Person.png' import CustomerService from '../../../../../../services/user-services/CustomerService' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' export default function CustomerProfile() { const [user, setUser] = useState({ email: '', firstName: '', lastName: '', password: '' }) useEffect(() => { CustomerService .getCustomerDetails().then( result => { setUser({ email: result.data.email, firstName: result.data.firstName, lastName: result.data.lastName, password: result.data.password }) }, error => { if (error.response) setTimeout(() => { alert("Action Failed\n" + error.response.data.response) }, 0) else setTimeout(() => { alert("Servers are currently down, try again later.") }, 0) }) }, []) console.log(user) console.log(user.email) const initialPassword = user.password const handleSubmit = (values, { setFieldValue }) => { //TODO finish this let sentPassword = values.password if (sentPassword === '') { //don't send "values.password", send "sentPassword" sentPassword = initialPassword; } alert(JSON.stringify(values)) setFieldValue('password', '') setTimeout(() => { alert('success') }, (0)) } return (
handleSubmit(values, { setFieldValue })} > {({ values, dirty }) => (<>
First Name
Last Name
Email
Password
)}
) }
